metadata.description:
Have you ever found yourself metaphorically staring at the mountain of things you have to do and becoming anxious?  Has fear ever stopped you from following through? I know I have.  The very appearance of my lofty goals can sometimes paralyze me.

Paramount examines this paradigm between two perspectives: first from a third person’s rhetorical vantage point and then from my own personal experiences with complacency, procrastination and failure.

I’ve learned in this life, you can’t be afraid to fail.  Every great anything/anybody has failed, often times, more than they succeed.  I’ve come to find that the true secret to success is not being afraid to risk not obtaining it.

As a listener, I hope this song is your new anthem to get things done!  Remember those things that are paramount in your life and keep climbing!
metadata.name: Paramount - Golden Egg
metadata.title: Paramount
